dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pygments
dependencies.description: Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python.

dependencies.name: py-nbclient
dependencies.description:
A client library for executing notebooks. Formally nbconvert's
ExecutePreprocessor.

dependencies.name: py-pathlib
dependencies.description:
Object-oriented filesystem paths. Attention: this backport module isn't
maintained anymore. If you want to report issues or contribute patches,
please consider the pathlib2 project instead.

dependencies.name: py-pydantic
dependencies.description: Data validation and settings management using Python type hinting.

dependencies.name: py-pytest
dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo
dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, transforms, and models for geospatial data. TorchGeo
is a PyTorch domain library, similar to torchvision, that provides
datasets, transforms, samplers, and pre-trained models specific to
geospatial data.
